overview:
Tonny Boerboom is the Chief Operations Officer at BWise and is responsible for all of its development activities, global software implementation services, global customer support, BWise Academy, SaaS and Application Management business and otherwise.

Mr. Boerboom has held international management positions at companies such as Digital Equipment, Kender Thijssen and the publicly traded IT company, Triple P NV at Vianen (NASDAQ SCM: TPPP). At Triple P, Mr. Boerboom took an active role in advising the Board of Directors and subsequently served as Chief Operations Officer. Mr. Boerboom holds a Technical Institute degree in Digital Process Control and had International Business Management training from INSEAD in Fontainebleau in France.

He is specialised in company turn-arounds, productivity improvement, business and portfolio development as well as organizational development and accellerated business growth.
